findings.title: PTRP - Potential Transfer Revert Propagation
findings.description: The contract sends funds to a `marketingWallet` which may revert from incoming payment, causing error propagation to the tokenâ€™s contract and reverting the transfer.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables are not defined as `immutable`, which can lead to optimization issues.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant, but are not, leading to potential gas consumption issues.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The codebase does not follow the Solidity style guide, making it harder to read and maintain.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are missing, which can cause issues with arithmetic operations.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables are not properly checked for zero values, leading to potential unexpected behavior or errors.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The pragma version is not locked, which can cause stability issues with the codebase.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods do not check if the result is successful, potentially leading to errors.
